question: Which countries were jointly declared as the winners of FIDE Chess Olympiad 2020?
explanation:
In the 2020 FIDE Chess Olympiad, India and Russia were declared joint winners. This was so because the final game was disrupted by internet disconnection.
This was the first time FIDE (Fédération Internationale des Échecs) conducted the Olympiad in an online mode. India had reached the finals of the FIDE Chess Olympiad for the first time. Indian team in the final include Viswanathan Anand, Koneru Humpy and R Praggnanandhaa.
